name: Essenceborn
description:
A deep turn-based fantasy tactics game.

Construct your battlegroup of champions, relics, spells and equipment. Enter battles on large maps with dynamic terrain. Gather essence to deploy your champions and cast your spells, then destroy your opponent's shrine and claim victory!

Early access includes only online PvP multiplayer.

Game Features
- Build your battlegroup from 62 unique champions, 25 relics, 47 spells and 1 equipment*
- All runes are FREE and available to use by all players immediately
- Master intricate synergies between units
- Battle over 5 large grid-based maps, modifying 12 terrain types to your advantage
- Claim points of strategic significance en-route to destroying their shrine
- Games take 10 to 30 minutes to complete

* the unit and spell list is currently 20% complete. This will grow over time.

This is an early access build and does not contain a tutorial. At present we recommend this to experienced players of tactics games, preferably with experience playing Pox Nora https://www.poxnora.com/.
